info.name: BYO RAG - Admin Service Collection
info.description:
Administrative Management Service API Collection for the BYO RAG System

âš™ï¸ **Service URL**: http://localhost:8085 (Docker deployment)
ðŸ“Š **Service Status**: Fully operational with complete administrative capabilities
ðŸ—ï¸ **Architecture**: Enterprise-grade admin operations with PostgreSQL persistence and comprehensive tenant management

**Administrative Capabilities:**
- **Tenant Management**: Complete organizational administration and configuration
- **User Administration**: Comprehensive user lifecycle and access control management
- **System Monitoring**: Real-time analytics, usage statistics, and performance monitoring
- **Resource Management**: Storage quotas, usage limits, and capacity planning
- **Audit & Compliance**: Complete activity logging and compliance reporting
- **Security Administration**: Role-based access control and security policy management

**Production Admin Features:**
- **Multi-Tenant Administration**: Complete isolation and management of tenant organizations
- **Database-Backed Operations**: Full PostgreSQL integration with JPA repositories
- **Role-Based Access Control**: Comprehensive RBAC with admin privilege validation
- **Real-Time Analytics**: Live usage statistics and performance monitoring dashboards
- **Compliance & Auditing**: Complete audit trails and regulatory compliance features

**Admin Security Model:**
- **Admin Authentication**: Separate admin authentication with enhanced security
- **Privilege Validation**: Role-based access control for all administrative operations
- **Audit Logging**: Comprehensive logging of all administrative actions
- **Multi-Factor Authentication**: Enhanced security for administrative access (future)

**Environment Variables:**
- `ADMIN_SERVICE_URL`: http://localhost:8085
- `ADMIN_TOKEN`: JWT admin authentication token
- `AUTH_TOKEN`: Regular user token (for some operations)
- `TENANT_ID`: Tenant identifier for management operations

exec: pm.test("Admin user has correct role", function () {

request.description:
Authenticate as system administrator to access administrative functions.

**Request Body:**
- `email`: Administrator email address (required)
- `password`: Administrator password (required)

**Authentication Requirements:**
- User must have ADMIN role in the system
- Account must have ACTIVE status
- Credentials verified against database with BCrypt hashing

**Response:**
- `accessToken`: JWT token for admin API access
- `refreshToken`: Token for session renewal
- `user`: Admin user profile with role and capabilities
- `capabilities`: Array of granted administrative capabilities
- `sessionExpiry`: Token expiration information

**Admin Capabilities:**
- `TENANT_MANAGEMENT`: Create, update, delete tenant organizations
- `USER_ADMINISTRATION`: Manage users across all tenants
- `SYSTEM_MONITORING`: Access system statistics and performance data
- `AUDIT_ACCESS`: View audit logs and compliance reports
- `RESOURCE_MANAGEMENT`: Manage quotas and resource limits

**Security Features:**
- Enhanced JWT tokens with admin-specific claims
- Comprehensive audit logging of admin sessions
- Rate limiting for admin login attempts
- Session tracking and management

request.description:
Refresh admin session tokens without re-authentication.

**Request Body:**
- `refreshToken`: Valid admin refresh token from login

**Response:**
- New access and refresh tokens with extended validity
- Updated session information and capabilities
- Token rotation for enhanced security

**Security Features:**
- Single-use refresh tokens (token rotation)
- Admin session validation and tracking
- Enhanced expiration policies for admin sessions

exec: throw new Error('ADMIN_TOKEN not found. Please login as admin first.');

request.description:
Logout from admin session and invalidate tokens.

**Behavior:**
- Invalidates current access and refresh tokens
- Logs logout event for audit purposes
- Clears server-side session state
- Updates last activity timestamps

**Security:**
- Token blacklisting to prevent replay attacks
- Session termination logging
- Cleanup of temporary admin privileges

request.description:
Validate user existence and admin role privileges.

**Query Parameters:**
- `email`: Email address to validate

**Response:**
- `exists`: Whether user exists in system
- `hasAdminRole`: Whether user has admin privileges
- `isActive`: Whether account is currently active
- `lastLogin`: Last successful login timestamp

**Use Cases:**
- Admin privilege verification
- User access validation
- Security auditing
- Role-based authorization checks

request.description:
Retrieve complete list of all tenant organizations in the system.

**Response:**
- Array of tenant objects with complete metadata
- Tenant configuration and limits information
- Usage statistics and status indicators
- Contact and billing information

**Tenant Properties:**
- `id`: Unique tenant identifier (UUID)
- `name`: Organization name
- `domain`: Primary domain name
- `status`: Tenant status (ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED, DELETED)
- `contactEmail`: Primary contact email address
- `maxUsers`: Maximum allowed users
- `maxStorage`: Storage limit in bytes
- `currentUsers`: Current user count
- `storageUsed`: Current storage utilization
- `createdAt`: Tenant creation timestamp
- `updatedAt`: Last modification timestamp
- `billingInfo`: Subscription and billing details

**Admin Privileges Required:**
- TENANT_MANAGEMENT capability
- ADMIN role with active status
- Valid admin session token

**Use Cases:**
- System-wide tenant oversight
- Usage monitoring and reporting
- Billing and subscription management
- Compliance and audit reporting
- Resource planning and capacity management

request.description:
Create a new tenant organization with complete configuration.

**Request Body:**
- `name`: Organization name (required)
- `domain`: Primary domain name (required, unique)
- `contactEmail`: Primary contact email (required)
- `maxUsers`: Maximum allowed users (required)
- `maxStorage`: Storage limit in bytes (required)
- `status`: Initial status (ACTIVE, INACTIVE)
- `settings`: Tenant-specific feature and policy settings
- `billingInfo`: Billing and subscription configuration

**Tenant Settings:**
- `allowFileUpload`: Enable/disable document uploads
- `maxFileSize`: Maximum file size per upload
- `enabledFeatures`: Array of enabled system features
- `retentionPolicyDays`: Data retention period
- `enableAuditLogging`: Audit trail configuration

**Response:**
- Created tenant object with assigned UUID
- Default configuration applied
- Initial usage statistics (all zeros)
- Activation timestamp and status

**Automatic Setup:**
- Database schema initialization for tenant data isolation
- Default admin user creation (optional)
- Initial resource allocation
- Monitoring and alerting setup

**Validation:**
- Domain uniqueness across system
- Contact email format validation
- Resource limit validation
- Feature compatibility checking

throw new Error('TENANT_ID not found. Please set a tenant ID first.');

request.description:
Update tenant configuration, limits, and settings.

**Updatable Fields:**
- `name`: Organization name
- `contactEmail`: Primary contact
- `maxUsers`: User limit (can increase/decrease)
- `maxStorage`: Storage limit (can increase/decrease)
- `status`: Tenant status (ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED)
- `settings`: Feature configuration and policies
- `billingInfo`: Billing and subscription details

**Resource Limit Changes:**
- **Increases**: Applied immediately
- **Decreases**: Validated against current usage
- **Warnings**: Generated for limits near current usage
- **Enforcement**: New limits applied to future operations

**Feature Updates:**
- Add or remove enabled features
- Update rate limiting and quotas
- Modify retention policies
- Configure audit and compliance settings

**Validation:**
- Current usage validation for limit decreases
- Feature dependency checking
- Contact email format validation
- Status transition validation

**Audit Trail:**
- Complete change logging
- Administrator identification
- Before/after value tracking
- Timestamp and reason recording

throw new Error('TENANT_ID not found. Please set a tenant ID first.');

request.description:
Deactivate a tenant organization (soft delete with data preservation).

**Request Body:**
- `reason`: Deactivation reason (required for audit)
- `effectiveDate`: When deactivation takes effect (optional)
- `preserveData`: Keep tenant data for potential reactivation
- `notifyUsers`: Send deactivation notifications to tenant users

**Deactivation Process:**
1. **User Notification**: Email all tenant users about deactivation
2. **Service Suspension**: Block all API access and operations
3. **Data Preservation**: Mark data as inactive but retain for recovery
4. **Billing Suspension**: Stop usage-based billing calculations
5. **Audit Logging**: Record deactivation event with full context

**Data Handling:**
- **preserveData=true**: Data retained for reactivation
- **preserveData=false**: Data marked for deletion after retention period
- **Immediate Effect**: All tenant operations blocked immediately
- **Backup Creation**: Automatic backup before deactivation

**Reversibility:**
- Deactivated tenants can be reactivated by administrators
- Data and settings preserved during deactivation period
- User accounts remain but are blocked from access
- Billing can be resumed upon reactivation

**Use Cases:**
- Subscription expiration handling
- Policy violation responses
- Voluntary account closure
- Billing dispute resolution
- Compliance requirement enforcement

request.description:
Get comprehensive usage statistics and analytics for a specific tenant.

**Query Parameters:**
- `timeRange`: Statistics time window (7d, 30d, 90d, all)
- `includeBreakdown`: Include detailed usage breakdown by category

**Response Analytics:**
- **User Metrics**: Active users, login frequency, feature usage
- **Storage Analytics**: Document count, file sizes, growth trends
- **Query Statistics**: RAG queries, response times, success rates
- **Document Processing**: Upload volume, processing times, formats
- **Performance Metrics**: System response times, error rates
- **Cost Analysis**: Resource consumption, billing projections

**Trend Analysis:**
- Daily/weekly/monthly usage patterns
- Growth rates and projections
- Seasonal usage variations
- Feature adoption trends
- Performance improvements or degradations

**Resource Utilization:**
- Current vs. allocated limits
- Peak usage periods
- Resource efficiency metrics
- Capacity planning recommendations

**Use Cases:**
- Billing verification and cost analysis
- Performance monitoring and optimization
- Capacity planning and resource allocation
- Feature usage analysis and optimization
- Customer success and support insights

request.description:
Get paginated list of all users across all tenants in the system.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number (0-based, default: 0)
- `size`: Items per page (default: 20, max: 100)
- `sort`: Sort criteria (createdAt,desc | email,asc | lastLogin,desc)
- `status`: Filter by user status (ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED, PENDING_VERIFICATION)
- `role`: Filter by user role (USER, ADMIN, MANAGER)
- `tenantId`: Filter by specific tenant (optional)
- `search`: Search by email, name, or partial matches

**Response:**
- Paginated list of users with complete profile information
- Cross-tenant user visibility for admin operations
- Total counts and filtering statistics
- User activity and engagement metrics

**User Information:**
- Complete profile data (excluding passwords)
- Tenant association and context
- Account status and verification state
- Last activity and login information
- Role and permission assignments
- Usage statistics and engagement metrics

**Security & Privacy:**
- Admin-only access with RBAC validation
- Sensitive information excluded from response
- Audit logging of admin user access
- Tenant isolation respect in detailed operations

**Use Cases:**
- System-wide user monitoring
- Cross-tenant user analytics
- Support and troubleshooting
- Compliance and audit reporting
- User lifecycle management

exec: throw new Error('ADMIN_TOKEN not found. Please login as admin first.');

query.description: Search query (email, name, or partial match)

request.description:
Advanced user search across all tenants with relevance ranking.

**Query Parameters:**
- `q`: Search query text (email, name, or partial matches)
- `limit`: Maximum number of results (default: 20, max: 100)
- `tenantId`: Restrict search to specific tenant (optional)

**Search Features:**
- **Email Matching**: Exact and partial email address searches
- **Name Matching**: First name, last name, and full name searches
- **Fuzzy Matching**: Typo tolerance and phonetic matching
- **Relevance Scoring**: Results ranked by match quality
- **Cross-Tenant Search**: Search across all tenant organizations
- **Field Highlighting**: Identify which fields matched the query

**Response:**
- `results`: Array of search results with relevance scores
- `totalMatches`: Total number of matching users
- `searchTime`: Query execution time
- `suggestions`: Alternative search suggestions for typos

**Result Properties:**
- `user`: Complete user profile information
- `relevanceScore`: Match quality score (0.0-1.0)
- `matchFields`: Array of fields that matched the query
- `tenant`: Associated tenant information

**Use Cases:**
- User lookup and identification
- Support ticket user resolution
- Account verification and validation
- Duplicate account detection
- Administrative user management

request.description:
Get comprehensive details for a specific user including activity and usage analytics.

**Query Parameters:**
- `includeActivity`: Include login and activity metrics (default: true)
- `includeUsage`: Include detailed usage statistics (default: false)

**Response Details:**
- **Profile Information**: Complete user profile (excluding password)
- **Account Status**: Current status, verification state, role assignments
- **Tenant Context**: Associated tenant information and permissions
- **Activity Metrics**: Login history, session duration, feature usage
- **Usage Statistics**: Document uploads, queries submitted, storage used
- **Security Information**: Failed login attempts, security events

**Activity Analytics:**
- Login frequency and patterns
- Feature usage and engagement
- Document processing history
- RAG query patterns and success rates
- Time-based usage trends

**Usage Statistics:**
- Storage utilization and file counts
- Query volume and complexity analysis
- Processing time and performance metrics
- Error rates and failure analysis
- Resource consumption patterns

**Use Cases:**
- User support and troubleshooting
- Account verification and validation
- Usage analysis and optimization
- Security incident investigation
- Performance monitoring and assistance

request.description:
Update user account status with comprehensive administrative controls.

**Request Body:**
- `status`: New user status (ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED, DELETED)
- `reason`: Reason for status change (required for audit)
- `effectiveDate`: When status change takes effect (optional)
- `duration`: Duration for temporary status changes (ISO 8601 duration)
- `notifyUser`: Send status change notification to user
- `allowAppeal`: Allow user to appeal the status change

**Status Transitions:**
- **ACTIVE**: Full system access restored
- **INACTIVE**: Account disabled but data preserved
- **SUSPENDED**: Temporary access restriction with appeal process
- **DELETED**: Account marked for deletion (soft delete)

**Suspension Features:**
- **Temporary Suspensions**: Automatic reactivation after specified duration
- **Appeal Process**: Users can request status review
- **Graduated Penalties**: Progressive enforcement for repeat violations
- **Custom Restrictions**: Selective feature access during suspension

**Audit and Compliance:**
- Complete change history with administrator identification
- Reason tracking and documentation
- User notification and communication logs
- Appeal tracking and resolution history

**Administrative Controls:**
- **Immediate Effect**: Status changes applied in real-time
- **Grace Periods**: Optional delay for user preparation
- **Bulk Operations**: Mass status updates for multiple users
- **Rollback Capability**: Undo recent status changes

**Use Cases:**
- Policy violation enforcement
- Account security responses
- Subscription management
- Compliance requirement adherence
- User lifecycle management

body.raw:
{
  "reason": "User support request - forgot password",
  "notifyUser": true,
  "temporaryPassword": false,
  "requireChangeOnLogin": true,

request.description:
Initiate administrative password reset for user account.

**Request Body:**
- `reason`: Administrative reason for password reset (required)
- `notifyUser`: Send reset notification to user email (default: true)
- `temporaryPassword`: Generate temporary password instead of reset token
- `requireChangeOnLogin`: Force password change on next login
- `expiryHours`: Reset token validity period (default: 24 hours)

**Reset Methods:**
- **Email Reset Token**: Secure token sent to user's verified email
- **Temporary Password**: Admin-generated temporary password
- **Direct Reset**: Admin sets new password directly

**Security Features:**
- **Token Expiration**: Time-limited reset tokens
- **Single Use**: Reset tokens are invalidated after use
- **Audit Logging**: Complete audit trail of password reset operations
- **Multi-Factor Validation**: Additional verification for sensitive accounts
- **IP Tracking**: Reset request origin tracking

**Response:**
- `status`: Reset operation status
- `resetToken`: Secure reset token (if applicable)
- `temporaryPassword`: Generated temporary password (if requested)
- `expiresAt`: Token expiration timestamp
- `emailSent`: Confirmation of user notification

**User Notification:**
- Email with reset instructions and security information
- Account security alert about admin-initiated reset
- Clear instructions for password reset completion
- Contact information for support if reset was not requested

**Use Cases:**
- User support password assistance
- Account recovery for locked users
- Security incident response
- Compromised account remediation
- Employee onboarding password setup

request.description:
Get comprehensive system overview with key metrics and health indicators.

**Response Metrics:**
- **Tenant Statistics**: Total tenants, active/inactive counts, growth trends
- **User Analytics**: Total users, active users, registration trends
- **System Health**: Service status, dependency health, error rates
- **Performance Metrics**: Response times, throughput, resource utilization
- **Usage Statistics**: RAG queries, document processing, storage utilization
- **Financial Metrics**: Revenue tracking, cost analysis, billing summaries

**Health Monitoring:**
- **Service Status**: All microservices health and availability
- **Database Health**: Connection pools, query performance, storage capacity
- **Infrastructure Status**: CPU, memory, network, storage metrics
- **Dependencies**: External service connectivity and performance
- **Alert Summary**: Active alerts and critical issues

**Performance Analytics:**
- **Response Times**: P50, P95, P99 latencies across all services
- **Throughput**: Requests per second, peak load handling
- **Error Rates**: Success rates, error categories, failure patterns
- **Resource Utilization**: CPU, memory, disk, network usage
- **Scalability Metrics**: Auto-scaling events, capacity planning data

**Business Intelligence:**
- **Growth Metrics**: User acquisition, tenant onboarding, feature adoption
- **Usage Patterns**: Peak hours, seasonal trends, geographic distribution
- **Revenue Analytics**: Subscription performance, usage-based billing
- **Customer Success**: Retention rates, satisfaction scores, support metrics

**Use Cases:**
- Executive dashboard and reporting
- System health monitoring and alerting
- Capacity planning and resource allocation
- Performance optimization and tuning
- Business intelligence and growth analysis

request.description:
Get comprehensive tenant analytics and distribution insights.

**Query Parameters:**
- `timeRange`: Analysis time window (7d, 30d, 90d, 365d)
- `includeBreakdown`: Include detailed category breakdowns

**Analytics Categories:**
- **Tenant Distribution**: Status, size, plan, geographic distribution
- **Growth Trends**: New tenant acquisition, churn rates, expansion
- **Resource Utilization**: Storage, compute, API usage across tenants
- **Performance Analysis**: Response times, success rates by tenant
- **Feature Adoption**: Feature usage patterns and adoption rates
- **Revenue Analysis**: Billing, subscription performance, revenue trends

**Distribution Analysis:**
- **By Status**: Active, inactive, suspended tenant counts
- **By Size**: Small, medium, large tenant categorization
- **By Plan**: Subscription tier distribution and migration patterns
- **By Industry**: Vertical market analysis and segmentation
- **Geographic**: Regional distribution and performance variations

**Trend Analysis:**
- **Acquisition Trends**: New tenant onboarding patterns
- **Churn Analysis**: Tenant departure reasons and patterns
- **Expansion Tracking**: Upsell and feature adoption trends
- **Seasonal Patterns**: Usage variations throughout the year
- **Cohort Analysis**: Tenant behavior by acquisition period

**Use Cases:**
- Strategic business planning and decision making
- Market analysis and competitive positioning
- Resource planning and infrastructure scaling
- Customer success and retention optimization
- Sales and marketing strategy optimization

request.description:
Get comprehensive system usage analytics and performance metrics.

**Query Parameters:**
- `timeRange`: Analysis period (1h, 24h, 7d, 30d, 90d)
- `granularity`: Data resolution (hourly, daily, weekly, monthly)
- `includeDetails`: Include detailed service breakdowns

**Usage Metrics:**
- **RAG Queries**: Total queries, success rates, response times
- **Document Processing**: Uploads, processing volumes, formats
- **Vector Operations**: Embedding generation, similarity searches
- **Storage Analytics**: Usage growth, file types, tenant distribution
- **API Usage**: Endpoint hit counts, rate limiting metrics
- **User Activity**: Active users, session durations, feature usage

**Performance Analytics:**
- **Response Times**: Latency percentiles across all services
- **Throughput**: Requests per second, peak load handling
- **Error Analysis**: Error rates, failure categories, root causes
- **Resource Utilization**: CPU, memory, storage, network usage
- **Scaling Events**: Auto-scaling triggers and effectiveness

**Service-Level Metrics:**
- **Auth Service**: Login rates, token validation performance
- **Document Service**: Processing throughput, format support
- **Embedding Service**: Vector generation rates, search performance
- **Core Service**: RAG query processing, LLM integration performance
- **Admin Service**: Administrative operation volumes and performance

**Trend Analysis:**
- **Growth Patterns**: Usage growth rates and projections
- **Seasonal Variations**: Time-based usage patterns
- **Peak Load Analysis**: Traffic spikes and capacity handling
- **Performance Trends**: Service improvement or degradation patterns

**Use Cases:**
- System performance monitoring and optimization
- Capacity planning and infrastructure scaling
- Cost analysis and resource optimization
- SLA compliance monitoring and reporting
- User experience analysis and improvement

request.description:
Get detailed system performance metrics and analysis.

**Query Parameters:**
- `timeRange`: Analysis period (1h, 6h, 24h, 7d)
- `breakdown`: Metrics breakdown level (service, endpoint, tenant, user)

**Performance Categories:**
- **Response Time Analysis**: P50, P90, P95, P99 latency percentiles
- **Throughput Metrics**: Requests per second, peak load capacity
- **Error Rate Analysis**: Success rates, error categorization
- **Resource Utilization**: CPU, memory, disk, network usage
- **Availability Metrics**: Uptime, service availability, SLA compliance

**Service-Level Performance:**
- **Auth Service**: Authentication latency, token validation speed
- **Document Service**: File processing times, upload throughput
- **Embedding Service**: Vector generation speed, search performance
- **Core Service**: RAG query processing times, LLM response latency
- **Admin Service**: Administrative operation performance
- **Gateway Service**: Routing latency, load balancing effectiveness

**Endpoint Analysis:**
- **High-Traffic Endpoints**: Most used APIs and their performance
- **Slow Endpoints**: Performance bottlenecks and optimization opportunities
- **Error-Prone Endpoints**: Endpoints with high failure rates
- **Resource-Intensive Operations**: CPU/memory intensive endpoints

**Infrastructure Metrics:**
- **Database Performance**: Query execution times, connection pooling
- **Cache Performance**: Hit rates, response times, memory usage
- **Message Queue**: Processing rates, queue depths, latency
- **External Dependencies**: Third-party service response times

**Use Cases:**
- Performance monitoring and alerting
- Bottleneck identification and optimization
- SLA compliance monitoring
- Capacity planning and scaling decisions
- System tuning and optimization
